GK19bahcar8u:4: kasya na sukhāya bhavane bhavati mahāratnalābhaśca // 8.2 //
GK19bahcar8u:7: ekadā tu bhūpaterbhramata evāṭavikasāmantasya śarabhaketoḥ sūnurvyāghraketurnāma kuto 'pi kajjalaśyāmalaśyāmalatāvalayenādhilalāṭamuccaiḥ kṛtamaulibandham,
GK19bahcar8u:8: andhakāriṇīmakāraṇabhuvā bhrakuṭibhaṅgena triśākhena triśākhena triyāmāmiva sāhasasahacāriṇīṃ lalāṭasthalīṃ sadā samudvahantam,
GK19bahcar8u:10: kiñciccullasya praviralapakṣmaṇaścakṣuṣaḥ sahajena rāgarociṣā rasāyanarasopayuktaṃ tārakṣavaṃ kṣatajamiva kṣarantam,
GK19bahcar8u:16: ajagaragarīyasā ca bhujayugalena laghayantaṃ tuhinaśailaśāladrumāṇāṃ drāghimāṇam,
GK19bahcar8u:17: varāhabālavalitabandhanābhirnāgadamanajūṭikāvāṭikābhirjaṭilīkṛtapṛṣṭhe prakoṣṭhe pratiṣṭhāṃ gataṃ godantamaṇicitraṃ trāpuṣaṃ valayaṃ bibhrāṇam,
GK19bahcar8u:27: śaśena śitāṭanīśikhāgragrathitagrīveṇa cāpāvṛtacañcūttānatāmratālunā tittiriṇā varṇakamuṣṭimiva mṛgayāyāḥ,
GK19bahcar8u:29: viṣamaviṣadūṣitavadanena ca vikarṇena kṛṣṇāhineva mūlagṛhītena vyagradakṣiṇakarāgram,
GK19bahcar8u:43: sarvasyāsya vindhyasya svāmī sarvapallīpatīnāṃ prāgraharaḥ śabarasenāpatirbhūkampo nāma /
GK19bahcar8u:44: tasyāyaṃ nirghātanāmā svasrīyaḥ sakalasyāsya vindhyakāntārāraṇyasya parṇānāmapyabhijñaḥ kimuta pradeśānām /
GK19bahcar8u:46: iti kathite ca nirgātastu kṣititalanihitamauliḥ praṇāmamakarot /
GK19bahcar8u:51: senāpatervānyasya vā tadanujīvinaḥ kasyacidudārarūpa nārī na gatā bhaveddarśanagocaram?' iti /
GK19bahcar8u:57: tathāpi devādeśādidānīmanveṣaṇaṃ prati pratidinamananyakṛtyaiḥ kriyate yatnaḥ /
GK19bahcar8u:58: itaścārdhagavyūtimātra eva munimahite mahati mahīdharamālāmūlaruhi mahīruhāṃ ṣaṇḍe 'pi piṇḍapātī prabhūtāntevāsiparivṛtaḥ pārāśarī divākaramitranāmā girinadīmāśritya prativasati,
GK19bahcar8u:60: tacchru tvā narapatiracintayat--śrūyate hi tatrabhavataḥ sugṛhītanāmnaḥ svargatasya
GK19bahcar8u:61: grahavarmaṇo bālamitraṃ maitrāyaṇīyastrayīṃ vihāya brāhnaṇāyano vidvānutpannasamādhiḥ
GK19bahcar8u:62: saugate mate yuvaiva kāṣāyāṇi gṛhītavān' iti /
GK19bahcar8u:63: prāyaśaśca janasya janayati suhṛdapi dṛṣṭo bhṛśamāśvāsam /
GK19bahcar8u:66: bhagavatī ca vaidheye 'pi dharmagṛhiṇī garimāṇamāpādayati pravrajyā,
GK19bahcar8u:68: yato naḥ kutūhali hṛdayamabhūtsatatamasya darśanaṃ prati prāsaṅgikamevedamāpatitamatikalyāṇaṃ paśyāmaḥ prayatnaprārthitadarśanaṃ janamiti /
GK19bahcar8u:70: samupadiśa tamuddeśaṃ yatrāste sa piṇḍapātī' iti /
GK19bahcar8u:72: atha krameṇa gacchata eva tasya anavakeśinaḥ kuḍmalitakarṇikārāḥ,
GK19bahcar8u:130: pradeśe sthāpayitvā vājisenāmavalambya ca tapasvijanadarśanocitaṃ vinayaṃ hṛdayena
GK19bahcar8u:131: dakṣiṇena ca hastena mādhavaguptamaṃse viralaireva rājabhiranugamyamānascaraṇābyāmeva prāvartata gantum /
GK19bahcar8u:132: atha teṣāṃ tarūṇāṃ madye nānādeśīyaiḥ sthānasthāneṣu sthāṇūnāśritaiḥ śilātaleṣūpaviṣṭairlatābhavanānyadhyāvasadbhiraraṇyānīnikuñjeṣu
GK19bahcar8u:139: ativinītaiḥ kapibhirapi caityakarma kurvāṇaistrisaraṇaparaiḥ paramopāsakaiḥ śukairapi
GK19bahcar8u:146: vāmakaratalaniviṣṭena nīvāramaśnatā pārāvatapotakena karṇotpaleneva priyāṃ maitrīṃ prasādayantam,
GK19bahcar8u:152: ullikhitapajharāgaprabhāpratimayā raktāvadātayā dehaprabhayā pāṭalīkṛtānāṃ kāṣāyagrahaṇamiva diśāmapyupadiśantam,
GK19bahcar8u:153: anauddhatyādadhomukhena mandamukulitakumudākareṇa snigdhadhavalaprasannena cakṣuṣā janakṣuṇṇakṣudrajantujīvanārthamamṛtamiva varṣantam,
GK19bahcar8u:178: atipraśāntagambhīrākārāropitabahumānaśva sādaraṃ dūrādeva śirasā vacasā manasā ca vavande /
GK19bahcar8u:181: cābijātyaprakāśakena garīyasā praśrayeṇa cāhlāditaścakṣuṣi ca cetasi ca yugapadagrahīta /
GK19bahcar8u:185: abyanandacca svāgatagirā gurumivābyāgataṃ bahu manyamānaḥ svenāsanenāsaddvamatreti nimantrayāñcakāra /
GK19bahcar8u:189: sthāne khalu tatrabhavānguṇānurāgī grahavarmā bahuśo varṇitavānasya guṇān' iti /
GK19bahcar8u:193: atibhūmirbhūmirevāsanaṃ bhavādṛśāṃ puraḥ saṃbāṣaṇā mṛtābhiṣekaprakṣālitasakalavapuṣaśca me pradeśavṛttiḥ /
GK19bahcar8u:198: ratnādikastu śilābhāraḥ' ityākalayya punaḥ punarabyarthyamāno 'pi yadā na pratyapadyata pārthivo vacanaṃ tadā svamevāsanaṃ punarapi bheje bhadantaḥ
GK19bahcar8u:201: ca parimalasubagaṃ vikacakusumapaṭalapāṇḍuraṃ latāvanamavādīt--“adyaprabhṛti na kevalamayamanindyo
GK19bahcar8u:203: ki nāma nālokyate jīvadbhiradbhutaṃ yena rūpamacintatopanatamidaṃ dṛkpathamupagatam /
GK19bahcar8u:205: ihāpi janmani dattamevāsmākamamunā tapaḥkleśena phalamasulabhadarśanaṃ darśayatā devānāṃpriyam /
GK19bahcar8u:208: mahadbhiḥ puṇyairvinā na viśrāmyanti sajjane tvādṛsi dṛśaḥ /
GK19bahcar8u:215: yatsatyaṃ mumukṣorapi me puṇyabhājamālokya punaḥ śraddhā jātā manujajanmani /
GK19bahcar8u:218: adya saphalaṃ janma pādapānāṃ yeṣāmasi gato gocaram /
GK19bahcar8u:220: asyatvīdṛśe śaiśave vinayasyopādhyāyaṃ dhyāyannapi na saṃbhāvayāmi bhuvi /
GK19bahcar8u:222: dhanyaḥ sa bhūbhṛdyasya vaṃśe maṇiriva muktāmayaḥ saṃbhūto 'si /
GK19bahcar8u:223: evaṃvidhsva ca puṇyavataḥ kathañcitprāptasya kena priyaṃ samācarāma iti pāriplavaṃ ceto naḥ /
GK19bahcar8u:224: sakalavanacarasārthadhāraṇasya kandamūlaphalasya girisaridambhaso vā ke vayam /
GK19bahcar8u:229: yadi ca noparuṇaddhi kañcatkāryalavamarakṣaṇīyākṣaraṃ vā kathanīyaṃ tatkathayatu bhavān sa śrotumabhilaṣati hṛdayaṃ sarvamidaṃ naḥ /
GK19bahcar8u:232: kasmācca saṃtaptarūpeva te tanuriyamasaṃtāpārhā vibhāvyate?' iti /
GK19bahcar8u:234: darśitasaṃbhrameṇānena madhurasavisaramamṛtamiva hṛdayadhṛtikaramanavarataṃ varṣatā vacasaiva te sarvamanuṣṭhitam /
GK19bahcar8u:237: mama hi vinaṣṭanikhileṣṭabandhorjīvitānubandhasya nibandhanamekaiva yavīyasī svasāvaśeṣā /
GK19bahcar8u:245: atastāmanveṣṭuṃ vayamaniśaṃ niśi niśi ca satatamimāmaṭavīmaṭāmaḥ /
GK19bahcar8u:246: na caināmāsādayāmaḥ kathayatu ca gururapi yadi kadācitkutaścidvane carataḥ śrutipathamupagatā tadvārtā' iti /
GK19bahcar8u:247: atha tacchutvā jātodvega iva bhadantaḥ punarabhyadhāt--“dhīman/
GK19bahcar8u:251: māṇa iva tasminnakasmādāgtayāparaḥ śamini vayasi vartamānaḥ saṃbhrāntarūpa iva purastāduparacitāñjalirjātakaruṇaḥ prakṣaritacakṣurbikṣurabhāṣata--“bhagavanbhadanta/
GK19bahcar8u:253: bālaiva ca balavadvyasanābibhūtā bhūtapūrvāpi kalyāṇarūpā strośokāveśavivaśā vaiśvānaraṃ viśati /
GK19bahcar8u:256: anuparatapūrvaṃ kṛmikīṭaprāyamapi duḥkhitaṃ dayārāśerāryasya gocaragatam' iti /
GK19bahcar8u:257: rājā tu jātānujāśahkaḥ sodaryasnehāccāntardruta iva duḥkhena dodūyamānahṛdayaḥ kathamapi gadgadikāgṛhītakaṇṭho vikalavāgbāṣpāyamāṇadṛṣṭiḥ papraccha--“pārāśarin/
GK19bahcar8u:264: ityāditaśca prabhṛti kārtsnyena kathyamānamicchāmi śrotuṃ kathamāryasya gatā darśanagocaramākārato vā kīdṛśo' iti /
GK19bahcar8u:266: śrūyatām--ahaṃ hi pratyuṣasyevādya vanditvā bhagavantamanenaiva nadīrodhasā saikatasukumāreṇayaducchayā vihṛtavānatidūram /
GK19bahcar8u:273: ca vātakhuḍakhedakhañjajaṅghājātajvareṇa ca pāṃsupāṇḍurapicchakena ca kharjūrajūṭajaṭājarjaritajānunā
GK19bahcar8u:286: mṛnmayīmiva niścetanatayā marunmayīmiva niḥśvāsasaṃpadā pāvakamayīmiva saṃtāpasaṃtānena
GK19bahcar8u:298: sthitā tarutale maraṇe ca patitāṃ dhātryutsa ṅge mahānarthe ca,
GK19bahcar8u:314: kṣīṇena vapuṣā puṇyena ca pādayoḥ patantobirvṛddhābhiraśruvārābhiśca,
GK19bahcar8u:339: sā tu samīpagate mayi tadavasthāpi sabahumānamānatamauliḥ praṇatavatī /
GK19bahcar8u:340: ahaṃ tu prabalakaruṇāpreryamāṇastāmālapitukāmaḥ punaḥ kṛtavānmanasi--kathamiva mahānubhāvāmenāmāmantraye /
GK19bahcar8u:361: ityevaṃ cintayatyeva mayi tasmātstraiṇādutthāyānyatarā yoṣidāryarūpeva śokaviklavā
GK19bahcar8u:369: prāṇarakṣaṇācca na paraṃ puṇyajātaṃ jagati gīyate janena /
GK19bahcar8u:372: yata iyaṃ naḥ svāminī maraṇena piturabhāvena bhartṛḥ pravāsena ca bhrātuḥ bhraṃśena ca śeṣasya bāndhavavargasyātimṛduhṛdayatayānapatyatayā ca
GK19bahcar8u:380: āryo 'pi tāvadasaṅyaśokāpanayanopāyopaderśānapuṇāṃ vyāpārayatu vāṇīmasyām' iti cātikṛpaṇaṃ vyāharantīmahamutthāpyodvignataraḥ śanairabhihitavān--“ārye/
GK19bahcar8u:384: mama hi gururapara iva bhagavānsugataḥ samīpagata eva /
GK19bahcar8u:386: duḥkhāndhakārapaṭalabhiduraiśca saugataiḥ subhāṣitaiḥ svakīyaiśca darśitanidarśanairnānāgamagurubhirgirāṃ kauśalaiḥ kuśalaśīlāmenāṃ prabodhapadavīmāropayiṣṭati' iti /
GK19bahcar8u:387: tacca śrutvā “tvaratāmāryaḥ' ityabhidadhānā sā punarapi pādayoḥ patitavatī /
GK19bahcar8u:390: niṃmnīkṛtamanā manyunā sarvākārasaṃvādinyā daśayaiva dūrīkṛtasaṃdeho dagdha iva sodaryāvasthāśravaṇena
GK19bahcar8u:393: bhāgadheyairetāmavasthāṃ nītā niṣkāraṇavairibhirvarākī vidīryamāṇaṃ me hṛdayamevaṃ
GK19bahcar8u:397: yadi kathañcijjīvantīṃ saṃbhāvayāmaḥ' iti bhāṣamāṇa evottasthau /
GK19bahcar8u:401: krameṇa ca samīpamupagataḥ śuśrāva latāvanāntaritasya mumūrṣormahataḥ straiṇasya tatkālocitānanekaprakārānālāpān--“bhagavandharma/
GK19bahcar8u:406: vka nu khalu proṣitā puṣpabhūtikuṭumbinī lakṣmīḥ /
GK19bahcar8u:407: anāthāṃ nātha mukharavaśyavividhādhividhurāṃ vadhūṃ vidhavāṃ vibodhayasi kimiti nemām /
GK19bahcar8u:432: saṃvādaya drutaṃ devīdāhaṃ devāya duḥkhitajanātiharāya harṣāya /
GK19bahcar8u:448: sthāsyasi kathamivāśive śavaśibire śabarike sutanu tanūnapāti patiṣyasi tvamapi /
GK19bahcar8u:458: menake, janmani janmani devīdāsyameva dadātu devo devaṃ dahandahanaḥ /
GK19bahcar8u:477: pādayoḥ patati te tāmbūlavāhinī bahumatā rājaputri, patralatā /
GK19bahcar8u:511: vṛkṣe kṣīriṇi kṣaṇe kṣaṇe kṣīṇapuṇyāyāḥ puraḥ /
GK19bahcar8u:519: ālalambe ca mūrcchāmīlitalocanāyā lalāṭaṃ hastena tasyāḥ sasaṃbhramam /
GK19bahcar8u:520: atha tena bhrātuḥ preyasaḥ prakoṣṭhabaddhānāmoṣadhīnāṃ rasavirasamiva pratyujjīvanakṣamaṃ
GK19bahcar8u:523: nirvāpayatā dahyamāma hṛdayapratyānayateva kuto 'pi jīvitamāhlādakena hastasaṃsparśena
GK19bahcar8u:525: tathā cāsaṃbhāvitāgamanasyācintitadarśanasya sahasā prāptasya bhrātuḥ svapnadṛṣṭadarśanasyeva
GK19bahcar8u:528: hā amba hā sakhyaḥ' iti vyāharantī,
GK19bahcar8u:530: sthirā bhava tvam' iti bhrātrā karasthagitamukhī samāśvāsyamānāpi,
GK19bahcar8u:545: prabhūtamanyubhārabharitāntaḥkaraṇā karuṇaṃ kāhalena svareṇa katicitkālamatidīrghaṃ ruroda /
GK19bahcar8u:546: vigate ca manyuvege vahneḥ samīpādākṣipya bhrātā nītā nikaṭavartini tarutale niṣasāda /
GK19bahcar8u:547: śanairācāryastu tathā harṣa iti vijñāya vivardhitādaraḥ sutarāṃ muhūrtamivātivāhya
GK19bahcar8u:548: nibhṛtasaṃjñājñāpitena śiṣyeṇopanītaṃ nalinīdalaiḥ svayamevādāya namro mukhaprakṣālanāyodakamupaninye /
GK19bahcar8u:549: narendro 'pi sādaraṃ gṛhītvā prathamamanavaratarodanātāmraṃ cirapravṛttāśrujalajālaṃ raktapaṅgajamiva svasuścakṣurakṣālayatpaścādātmanaḥ /
GK19bahcar8u:550: prakṣālitamukhaśaśini ca mahīpāle sarvato niḥśabdaḥ saṃbabhūvasakalo likhita iva lokaḥ /
GK19bahcar8u:553: eṣa te bharturhṛdayaṃ dvitīyamasmākaṃ ca guruḥ' iti /
GK19bahcar8u:557: smitvā ca kṣaṇamekaṃ pradarśitapraśrayo mṛduvādī madhurayā vācā vyājahāra--“kalyāṇarāśe/
GK19bahcar8u:561: snātvā ca gamyatā tāmeva bhūyo bhuvam' iti /
GK19bahcar8u:562: atha bhūpatiranuvartamāno laukikamācāramācāryavacanaṃ cotthāya snātvā girisariti saha svasrā tāmeva bhūmiptayāsīt /
GK19bahcar8u:563: tasyāṃ ca saparijanāṃ prathamamāhitāvadhānaḥ pārśvavartī paravatīṃ śucā patipiṇḍapradarśitaprayatnapratipannābhyavahārakāraṇāṃ bhaginīmabhojayat
GK19bahcar8u:565: bhuktavāṃśca bandhanātprabhṛti vistarataḥ svasuḥ kānyakubjād gauḍasaṃbhramaṃ guptito
GK19bahcar8u:566: guptanāmnā kulaputreṇa niṣkāsanaṃ nirgatāyāśca rājyavardhanamaraṇaśravaṇaṃ śrutvā
GK19bahcar8u:569: tataḥ sukhāsīnamekatra tarutale viviktabhuvi bhaginīdvitīyaṃ dūrasthitānujīvijanaṃ rājānamācāryaḥ samupasṛtya śanairāsāṃcakre /
GK19bahcar8u:572: ākhyeyamasti naḥ kiñcit-- ayaṃ hi yauvanaunmādātparibhūya bhūyasīrbhāryā yauvanāvatārataralatarāstārārājo
GK19bahcar8u:573: rajanīkarṇapūraḥ purā puruhūtapurodhaso dhiṣaṇasya purandhrīṃ dharmapatnīṃ patnīyannatitaralastārāṃ nāmāpajahāra /
GK19bahcar8u:575: cakitacakoralocanayā ca tayā sahātikāmayā sarvākārābhirāmayā ramamāṇo ramaṇīyeṣu deśeṣu cacāra /
GK19bahcar8u:576: cirācca kathañcitsarvagīrvāṇavāṇīgauravād girāṃ patyuḥ punaripa pratyarpayāmāsa tām /
GK19bahcar8u:578: ekadā tu śailādudayādadayamāno vimale vāriṇi varuṇālayasya saṃkrāntamātmanaḥ pratibimbaṃ vilokitavān /
GK19bahcar8u:579: dṛṣṭvā ca tattadā sasmaraḥ sasmāra smeragaṇḍasthalasya tārāyā mukhasya /
GK19bahcar8u:580: mumoca sa manmathonmādamathyamānamānasaḥ svaḥstho 'pyasvasthaḥ sthavīyasaḥ pītasakalakumutavanaprabhāpravāhadhavalatārābhyāmiva locanābhyāṃ bāṣpavāribindūn /
GK19bahcar8u:582: tāsāṃ ca kukṣikoṣeṣu muktāphalībhūtānavāpa tānkathamapi rasātalanivāsī vāsukirnāma viṣamucāmīśaḥ /
GK19bahcar8u:583: sa ca tairmuktāphalaiḥ pātālatale 'pi tārāgaṇamiva darśayadbhirekāvalīmakalpayat /
GK19bahcar8u:585: sā ca bhagavataḥ somasya sarvāsāmoṣadhīnāmadhipateḥ prabhāvādatyantaviṣaghnī himāmṛtasaṃbhavatvācca sparśena sarvasattvasaṃtāpahāriṇī babhūva
GK19bahcar8u:586: yataḥ sa tāṃ sarvadā viṣoṣmaśāntaye vāsukiḥ paryadhatta /
GK19bahcar8u:587: samatikrāmati ca kiyatyapi kāle kadācinnāmaikāvalīṃ tasmānnāgarājānnāgārjuno nāma nāgairevānītaḥ pātālatalaṃ bhikṣurabhikṣata lebhe ca /
GK19bahcar8u:588: nirgatya ca rasātalāttrisamudrādhipataye sātavāhananāmne narendrāya suhṛde sa dadau tām /
GK19bahcar8u:589: sā cāsmākaṃ kālena śiṣyaparamparayā kathamapi hastamupagatā /
GK19bahcar8u:590: yadyapi ca paribhava iva bhavati bhavādṛśāṃ dattrima upacārastathāpyoṣadhibuddhyā
GK19bahcar8u:593: unmucyamānāyā eva yasyāḥ prabhālepini labdhāvakāśe viśadamahasi mahīyasi visarpati
GK19bahcar8u:607: cakṣuḥ kathamapi prayatnena dadarśa sarvāśāpūraṇīṃ paṅktīkṛtāmiva diṅnāgakaraśīkarasaṃhatim,
GK19bahcar8u:611: dhavalatāguṇaparigṛhītāṃ kāntimiva nirgatāṃ kṣīrarāśeḥ anekamahāmahībhṛtparamparāgatāṃ gaṅgāmiva durgatiharām,
GK19bahcar8u:619: ācāryastu tāmuddhṛtya babandha bandhure skandhabhāge bhūpateḥ /
GK19bahcar8u:623: ke ca vayamidānīmātmano 'pi kimuta grahaṇasya pratyākhyānasya vā /
GK19bahcar8u:627: samatikrānte ca kiyatyapi kāle gate caikāvalīvarṇanālāpe lokasyānantaraṃ labdhaviśrambhā rājyaśrīstāmbūlavāhinīṃ patralatāmāhūyopāṃśukimapi sarṇamūle śanairādideśa /
GK19bahcar8u:629: devī vijñāpayati na smarāmyāryasya puraḥ kadāciduccairvacanamapi /
GK19bahcar8u:631: iyaṃ hi śucāmasahyatāṃ vyāpārayantī hatadaivadattā ca daśā śithilayati vinayam /
GK19bahcar8u:661: bhūrikāvyakathākaṭhorāṇi bahuśākhodvahanabṛhanti viduṣāmapi hṛdayāni nālaṃ soḍhumāpātaṃ
GK19bahcar8u:672: kṣaṇamapi kṣamamāṇā galantyāyuṣkalākalanakuśalā nilaye nilaye kālanālikāḥ /
GK19bahcar8u:673: jagati sarvajantujīvitopahārapātinī saṃcarati jhaṭiti caṇḍikā yamājñā /
GK19bahcar8u:675: pratidiśaṃ paryaṭanti peṭakaiḥ prataptalohalohitākṣāḥ kālakūṭakāntikālakāyāḥ kālapāśapāṇayaḥ kālapuruṣāḥ /
GK19bahcar8u:679: sakalalokakavalāvalehalampaṭā bahalā vahaṃlihā leḍhi lohitācitā citāṅgārakālī kālarātrijihvā jīvitāni jīvinām /
GK19bahcar8u:680: tṛptamaśikṣitā ca bhagavataḥ sarvabhūtabhujo bubhukṣā mṛtyoḥ /
GK19bahcar8u:687: evamavadhṛtya nātyarthamevārhasi medhāvini mṛduni manasi tamasaḥ prasaraṃ dātum /
GK19bahcar8u:689: api ca dūragate 'pi hi śoke nanvidānīmapekṣaṇīya evāyaṃ jyeṣṭhaḥ pitṛkalpo bhrātā bhavatyā guruḥ /
GK19bahcar8u:690: itarathā ko na bahu manyeta kalyāṇarūpamīdṛsaṃ saṃkalpamatrabhavatyāḥ kāṣāyagrahaṇakṛtam /
GK19bahcar8u:695: yadi bhrāteti yadi jyeṣṭha iti yadi vatsa iti yadi guṇavāniti yadi rājeti sarvathā sthātavyamasya niyoge' ityuktvā vyaraṃsīt /
GK19bahcar8u:696: uparatavacasi ca tasminnijagāda narapatiḥ--“āryamapahāya ko 'nya evamabhidadhyāt /
GK19bahcar8u:702: abhyarthanāyā rakṣanti ca jalanidhaya iva maryādāmāryāḥ /
GK19bahcar8u:703: dattameva ca śarīramidamanabhyarthitena prathamamevātithyāya mānanīyena bhavatā mhayam /
GK19bahcar8u:704: ataḥ kiñcidarthaye bhadantamiyaṃ naḥ svasā bālā ca bahuduḥkhakheditā ca sarvakāryāvadhīraṇoparodhenāpi yāvallālanīyā nityam /
GK19bahcar8u:707: ato niyuṅktāṃ kiyantamapi kālamātmānamāryo 'pi kārye madīye /
GK19bahcar8u:716: iyaṃ tu grahīṣyati mayaiva samaṃ samāptakṛtyena kāṣāyāṇi /
GK19bahcar8u:719: muninātho 'pyanapekṣitātmasthitiranukampeti kṛtvā kṛpāvānātmānaṃ vaṭharasattvebhyaḥ katikṛtvo na dattavān /
GK19bahcar8u:720: ataḥ paraṃ bhavanta eva bahutaraṃ jānanti--ityuktvā tūṣṇīṃ babhūva bhūpatiḥ /
GK19bahcar8u:721: bhūyastu babhāṣe bhadantaḥ--“bhavyā na dviruccārayanti vācam /
GK19bahcar8u:723: amunā janena upayogastu nirupayogasyāsya laghuni guruṇi vā kṛtye guṇavadāyattaḥ' iti /
GK19bahcar8u:724: atha tathā tasminnabhinanditapraṇaye prīyamāṇaḥ pārthivastatra tāmuṣitvā vibhāvarīmuṣasi
GK19bahcar8u:725: ca vasanālaṅkārādipradānaparitoṣitaṃ visarjya nirghātamācāryeṇa saha svasāramādāya prayāṇakaiḥ /
GK19bahcar8u:727: tatra ca rājyaśrīprāptivyatikarakathāṃ kathayata eva praṇayibhyo ravirapi tatāra gaganatalam /
GK19bahcar8u:728: bahalamadhupaṅkapiṅgalaḥ paṅgajākara iva saṃcukoca cakravākavallabho vāsaraḥ prakīrṇaāni
GK19bahcar8u:730: nijavapuṣi pūṣā pāpamūṣi punarapi saṃjahāra jālakāni rociṣām /
GK19bahcar8u:738: niyatakālātipātadūyamānadākṣāyaṇīkṣiptaḥ dhātutaṭa iva ca sumerorasuravadhābhicāracarupacanapiśunaḥ śoṇitavkāthakaṣāyitakukṣirativisaṃkaṭaḥ kaṭāha iva ca bārhaspatyaḥ,
GK19bahcar8u:742: samavasite ca saṃdhyāṃsamaye samanantaramaparimitayaśaḥpānatṛṣitāya muktāśailaśilācaṣaka iva nijakulakīrtyā,
